existing_features.title: Update the Selects section UI to more closely match the styling and interaction patterns of the Selects section on https://www.aurient.ai/ (typography hierarchy, spacing, card layout, hover states), while keeping the app’s existing Tailwind theme tokens (e.g., accent/background/foreground).

Update the Experience section UI to more closely match the styling and interaction patterns of the Experience section on https://www.aurient.ai/ (typography hierarchy, spacing, timeline/card layout, hover states), while keeping the app’s existing Tailwind theme tokens (e.g., accent/background/foreground).

Adjust Selects and Experience content labeling/writing so the visible category labeling style matches Aurient.ai’s concise, uppercase category labels: AI, ART, TECH, CRYPTO, CULTURE (use these exact labels where categories are displayed).

Add the same images shown in Aurient.ai’s Selects and Experience sections to the corresponding items in this app, and ensure each image is clickable and opens the image in a new browser tab (target="_blank" with rel="noopener noreferrer").

new_feature_requests.summary: Match the styling of the Selects and Experience sections to aurient.ai, including category labels (AI/ART/TECH/CRYPTO/CULTURE) and images that open in a new tab.
